attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes of becoming a karen(cause we all know the Karen’s have this app) but never happened it was such a disgrace I still like Obama more such disappointment plus when I opend this app I saw a Cheeto like no thx🖐🏽and it was putting tanning spray on🤮 it was horrifying and back to the karen thing I went to a grocery store never asked for a manager so I know something went wrong. This was just a waste of my phone space DONT GET
attributes.title: Disgraceful

attributes.review: what 🤔 the fudge 🍫 nugget 🍗 are you talking 💭 about ⁉️like 😒 what ❗️are you stressed 😥 about 🤪 it’s day one ☝️of summer 🚌😁 chill out 🥶.  Donald Trump. the app is not it 🙄 like already entering the app we see at least 3 PHOTOS of him👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨. the disrespect, it’s 4:20 and that scared me. might sue ALSO nothing juicy nothing good and yeah just a waste of storage now i have to delete it ❤️😼🔫😣😛🧍‍♀️but this😌one✨is💅🏽for🤷🏾‍♀️the 💯boys🎾with💍the 🚴boomin🎙system 👩🏾‍🦱 top 👨🏿‍🍳down👇ac💨with🥦the👐🏽coolin☃️system.
attributes.title: BAD APP NEVER USING AGAIN

attributes.review: As soon as I clicked the app my battery percentage went down by 5 percent, this has never happened on another app and considering I just got this phone a few months ago and it’s up to par this is extremely disappointing and frustrating. A lot of the times I click on it it has to reinstall on its own and the app itself is extremely slow. So disappointed in this...
attributes.title: EXTREMELY SLOW AND DRAINS BATTERY

attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep up with current events, but man was I wrrrrrong! The second I opened my app, my phone started going crazy! It’s like it possessed my phone. Then my pet snake started hissing at me! She eventually made a strike and hit my left eye! I am now completely blind in my left eye. Well actually it’s gone. But the app did something to my snake. It started playing the weirdest music and it went on from there. Do Not Download This App!!!
attributes.title: THIS IS A HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I have no words to describe how horrifying this application is. Disgusting. Had to wash my eyes out with Clorox bleach but that didn’t hurt nearly as much as the pain I went through during my brief experience on this app. Please for the love of god do NOT download, you will regret it. Parents, please keep a watchful eye on your children’s’ devices, and if one of them has this app on their phone you might as well throw the whole kid away. Peace and love and safety to all 💗💗
attributes.title: Wow

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking i would see the president of the united states but the only thing on it was this orange, fat, bald man who, is know as a sex trafficker with severe dementia, a crippling ego, lying, brainwasher with a god complex who over is disgusting in every way i am utterly disgusted with his actions and he deserves to be but in jail but at the end of the day he will become consumed with mental illness that he will become brain dead (fingers crossed) do not download this app it is utterly brainwashed and bigoted!
attributes.title: Grossly prevented!

attributes.review: I opened this app thinking it would be music related, instead i saw an ORANGE!!!! This is obviously a clickbait app that uses “TRUMP” as a way to get the attention of music goers 🙄. People were saying it was an app of really bad trumpet players and thought the videos i saw were funny! I downloaded it to find NO TRUMPETS 💔!!!! IT WAS ALL A LIE! I did more research and found that the people who were spreading those videos were actually liars and apart of this “TRUMP” app. THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISING! THIS NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN!!!!
attributes.title: HORRID!!!

attributes.review: i was never and will never be a trump supporter. i wanted to see if this was just me being a follower so i wanted to see the good in him. j o k i n g but besides that he disgust me honestly america isn’t the land of the free. it’s stolen land and no one is seen equal. in my belief apple shouldn’t be giving trump the right into even having a app. i thought everyone was equal but trump making me second guess that. also for taking down tiktok. we all know he’s just mad because of what happened to his rally. he just can’t handle gen z. we are strong and once we get to vote we won’t let anyone like trump to be president (i hope) black lives matter no justice no peace. donald you set this up for yourself❤️
attributes.title: most revolting app i’ve ever used!!

attributes.review:
I was hoping for something better instead it’s just a bunch of merch .... not even a completely legit app !!! 
With Record unemployment, nearly 120,00 deaths from COVID-19 and nationwide protests were all factors in Trump's polling numbers slipping before this week — even endangering his Electoral College firewall for reelection — and then damaging revelations from John Bolton's book dropped.

On Wednesday, passages from his ex-national security adviser's book came so thick and fast that it was difficult to figure out which one was more damning for the president.

Bolton recalled Trump telling China's president that building concentration camps for Uighur Muslims was "exactly the right thing to do."

Sorry not sorry 😐 I’m deleting this app!!
attributes.title: Was hoping for something better... just delete

attributes.review:
this app is absolutely unexceptable... i opened the app and was greeted with adds, and people talking about some horrible person and i have to say i am ABSOLUTELY disgusted 😟! This app must NAWT continue. i decided to keep on looking because you know.. why not? but then my lights started to flicker on and off and i just kept seeing this walking.. walking orange 🍊 i can’t unsee it honestly i’m horrified 👁👄👁. 

please show awareness to this, thank you. 😍🥰😘
attributes.title: i am truly in tears...
